description: {"blocks":[{"key":"11rs8","text":"We presented three barcoded technologies (BD Rhapsody) that are accessible to most researchers: high-throughput single-cell ONT full-length RNA sequencing (FLOUR-seq). FLOUR-seq combines BD Rhapsody and nanopore sequencing to detect the RNA panorama (including nascent, mature, and degrading RNAs) in cells.The ultralong three barcodes can be discriminated using nanopore technology with 70% debarcoding efficiency and can detect the RNA panorama.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"76imk","text":"The mouse testis were dissociated to single cells refer to Adult mouse testis cell dissociation (on ice).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":45}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D38A30A3C53111EC97780A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/adult-mouse-testis-cell-dissociation-on-ice-kxygxmm1dl8j/v1?step=2"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4g49t","text":"Dilute 20000 cells with cold Sample Buffer (Cat. No. 650000062) to 650 μL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1d2m","text":"Load cartridge with materials listed using the P1200M pipette:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajb3t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0ull","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"v736","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["135","135","135"],"data":[["Material to load","Volume (μL)","Pipette mode"],["Air","700","Prime/Treat"],["􏰀Set P1200M pipette to Cell Load mode.\n􏰀Pipet-mix the cell suspension with a manual P1000 pipette.","",""],["Cell suspension","575","Cell Load"]],"guid":"D789BEB0C53511ECABD4D53EC1F26C88","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"A_3":[3,1]},"printData":[["Material to load","Volume (μL)","Pipette mode"],["Air","700","Prime/Treat"],["􏰀Set P1200M pipette to Cell Load mode.\n􏰀Pipet-mix the cell suspension with a manual P1000 pipette.","",""],["Cell suspension","575","Cell Load"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58r1n","text":"Incubate at room temperature (15°C to 25°C) for 15 minutes. During 15 minute incubation, prepare Cell Capture Beads(Cat. No. 650000089).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":115,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparing, loading and washing Cell Capture Beads
Preparing, loading and washing Cell Capture Beads
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"809fo","text":"Incubate the cartridge at room temperature (15°C to 25°C) for 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparing, loading and washing Cell Capture Beads
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cf0l7","text":"Place cartridge on the plate shaker plate adapter. Shake the cartridge at room temperature (15°C to 25°C) at 1,000 rpm for 15 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es439","text":"Return cartridge to Express instrument, and wait 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

No. 650000062)","700","Wash"],["Air","700","Wash"],["Cold Sample Buffer (Cat. No. 650000062)","700","Wash"]],"guid":"9786526BC53711EC97780A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Material to load","Volume (μL)","Pipette modea"],["Air","700","Wash"],["Cold Sample Buffer (Cat. No. 650000062)","700","Wash"],["Air","700","Wash"],["Cold Sample Buffer (Cat. No. 650000062)","700","Wash"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"feqr1","text":"Add 75.0 μL 1 M DTT (Cat. No. 650000063) to one 15 mL Lysis Buffer bottle (Cat. No. 650000064). Briefly vortex lysis mix, place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4jsuk","text":"Move the left slider to LYSIS on Express instrument. Set P1200M pipette to Lysis mode. Set P1200M pipette to Lysis mode.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":75,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":109,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pp3c","text":"   Material to loadVolume (μL)Pipette modeLysis Buffer with DTT550Lysis","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":71}],"data":{}},{"key":"bdr5i","text":"Incubate at room temperature (15°C to 25°C) for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5326l","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ut5q","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["207",100,100],"data":[["Material to load","Volume (μL)","Pipette mode"],["Lysis Buffer with DTT","550","Lysis"]],"guid":"E8DFDAE7C53711EC97780A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Material to load","Volume (μL)","Pipette mode"],["Lysis Buffer with DTT","550","Lysis"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae8kj","text":"Place the 5 mL LoBind Tube in Express instrument drawer. Ensure P5000M pipette is set to Retrieval mode. Move the front slider to BEADS on Express instrument.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":89,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":130,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f6frf","text":"Move the left slider to RETRIEVAL. Leave Retrieval magnet in down position for 30 seconds. Aspirate 5,000 μL Lysis Buffer with DTT with the P5000M pipette. Press down on P5000M pipette to seal against the gasket. Move the left slider to the middle position (0), andimmediatelyload 4,950 μL Lysis Buffer with DTT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":258,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjbmh","text":"Remove pipette from gasket, and purge tip. Move the front slider to OPEN, and place the 5 mL LoBind Tube on large magnet with 15 mL tube adapter (V\u0026P Scientific Cat. No. VP 772FB-1A) for 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":68,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dint","text":"After 1 minute incubation leaving the 5 mL tube containing retrieved Cell Capture Beads on large magnet, remove all but ~1 mL of supernatant without disturbing beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m72h","text":"Remove tube from magnet. Gently pipet-mix beads, and transfer them to a new 1.5 mL LoBind Tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9h0r3","text":"Place tube on magnet for ≤2 minutes, and remove supernatant. Avoid leaving Lysis Buffer or bubbles in tube. Lysis Buffer might cause the reverse transcription reaction to fail.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f4pi6","text":"Remove tube from magnet and pipet 1.0 mL of cold Bead Wash Buffer (Cat. No. 650000065) into tube. Pipet-mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dnhii","text":"Place tube on 1.5 mL tube magnet for ≤2 minutes, and remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fjn4e","text":"Remove tube from magnet, and pipet 1.0 mL cold Bead Wash Buffer (Cat. No. 650000065) into tube. Pipet-mix, and place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"82pvt","text":"In a new 1.5-mL LoBind tube, pipet the following reagents.\ncDNA/Template switching mix\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":59,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jarg","text":"   ComponentFor 1 library (μL)For 1 library with 20% overage (μL)RT Buffer4048dNTP2024RT 0.1 M DTT1012Bead RT/PCR Enhancer1214.4RNase Inhibitor1012Reverse Transcriptase1012Nuclease-free water92110.4Total194232.8","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":211}],"data":{}},{"key":"4qb7u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nple","text":" Gently vortex mix, briefly centrifuge, and place back on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6itu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","6_2":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","7_2":"","8_0":"","8_1":"","8_2":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["169",100],"data":[["Component","Volume (μL)"],["RT Buffer","40"],["dNTP","20"],["RT 0.1 M DTT","10"],["Bead RT/PCR Enhancer","12"],["RNase Inhibitor","10"],["Reverse Transcriptase","10"],["Nuclease-free water","92"],["Total","194"]],"guid":"4D488397C53D11EC97780A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Volume (μL)"],["RT Buffer","40"],["dNTP","20"],["RT 0.1 M DTT","10"],["Bead RT/PCR Enhancer","12"],["RNase Inhibitor","10"],["Reverse Transcriptase","10"],["Nuclease-free water","92"],["Total","194"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cd06l","text":"Place the tube of washed Cell Capture Beads on a 1.5-mL tube magnet for≥2 minutes. Remove the\nsupernatant and pipet 194 μL of cDNA mix into the beads. Pipet-mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ak8rn","text":"Incubate the bead suspension on the thermomixer at 1,200 rpm and 42°C for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"uv95","text":"Resuspend the beads with the saved supernatant in step 25, add 3 μL of template switch oligo (100 uM5'  A AGC AGT GGT ATC AAC GCA GAG TAC rG rG +G 3') , and incubate on the thermomixer for 15 minutes at 1,200 rpm and 42°C. Add 2 μL of 1 M MgCl2 to the reaction mix, and incubate on the thermomixer for another 15 minutes at 1,200 rpm and 42°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae9gf","text":"Place tube on 1.5 mL tube magnet for ≤2 minutes, and remove supernatant. Wash the beads twice with 1x RT buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1jc65","text":"Place tube on 1.5 mL tube magnet for ≤2 minutes, and pipet supernatant to a new tube.  Remove tube from magnet, and pipet 200 μL the following reagents into tube.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3r2qj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4rmsg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["418",100],"data":[["Component","Volume (μL)"],["10x Exonuclease I reaction buffer (BD Express, Cat. No. 650000071)","20"],["Exonuclease I (BD Express, Cat. No. 650000072)","10"],["Nuclease-free water","170"]],"guid":"D103AE00C56911ECABD4D53EC1F26C88","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Volume (μL)"],["10x Exonuclease I reaction buffer (BD Express, Cat. No. 650000071)","20"],["Exonuclease I (BD Express, Cat. No. 650000072)","10"],["Nuclease-free water","170"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57c0i","text":"Briefly spin the tube with the bead suspension. Place the tube on the magnet for≤1 minute until clear. Remove the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fb74f","text":"Remove the tube from the magnet, and pipet 200 μL of cold Bead Resuspension Buffer into the tube. Pipet- mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7o92t","text":"Place the tube beads in Bead Resuspension Buffer on a 1.5-mL magnet for≤1 minute. Remove the supernatant. Suspend the beads with following PCR reaction mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cdlv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmkl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4e8pk","text":"Universal Oligo: 5’-ACACGACGCTCTTCCGATCT-3'","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fop9r","text":"TSO PCR primer: 5‘-AAGCAGTGGTATCAACGCAGAGTAC-3'","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lu71","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["287",100,100],"data":[["Component","Volume (μl )","Final Conc"],["KAPA HiFi HotStart 2x ReadyMix","100","1x"],["Universal Oligo (BD Express, 650000074)","6","0.3 μM"],["TSO PCR primer (10μM)","6","0.3μM"],["Nuclease-free water","up to 200μl",""]],"guid":"A3563816C56C11EC97780A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Volume (μl )","Final Conc"],["KAPA HiFi HotStart 2x ReadyMix","100","1x"],["Universal Oligo (BD Express, 650000074)","6","0.3 μM"],["TSO PCR primer (10μM)","6","0.3μM"],["Nuclease-free water","up to 200μl",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fb1du","text":"Ensuring that the beads are fully resuspended, pipet 25 μL of PCR reaction mix with beads into each of 8 0.2-mL PCR tubes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b3ebc","text":"Program the thermal cycler as follows.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ivi3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e60vv","text":"    StepCyclesTemperatureTimeHot start195°Ca3 minDenaturation11–14b95°C30 sAnnealing60°C3 minExtension72°C1 minFinal extension172°C5 minHold14°C∞","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":145}],"data":{}},{"key":"ahbdq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"126js","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qqpc","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","5_3":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","6_2":"","6_3":""},"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100,100],"data":[["Step","Cycles","Temperature","Time"],["Hot start","1","95°C","3 min"],["Denaturation","11","98°C","20 s"],["Annealing","","62°C","3 min"],["Extension","","72°C","4 min"],["Final extension","1","72°C","2 min"],["Hold","1","4°C","∞"]],"guid":"25501747C56E11EC97780A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"B_3":[1,3]},"printData":[["Step","Cycles","Temperature","Time"],["Hot start","1","95°C","3 min"],["Denaturation","11","98°C","20 s"],["Annealing","","62°C","3 min"],["Extension","","72°C","4 min"],["Final extension","1","72°C","2 min"],["Hold","1","4°C","∞"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ocg5","text":"Pipet-mix and combine the four reactions into a new 1.5-mL LoBind tube. Place the 1.5-mL tube on the magnet for≤1 minute. Pipet the supernatant into the new 1.5-mL LoBind tube without disturbing the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
